name: Aukushi and The Ghost Cabin (SARACATUNGA Studio)
name_original: Aukushi and The Ghost Cabin (SARACATUNGA Studio)
description:
"Aukushi and the Ghost Cabin" is a 2D adventure platform video game for one player, Metroidvania style.

You will embody the story of a wandering spirit that seeks to regain its identity; To achieve this, he will have to enter the intricate and mysterious corridors of Ghost Cabin, a place full of ghosts and relics, but, above all, of answers that lead him to his ultimate goal: to know who he is.

You will find a variety of skills that you can use and will allow you to overcome the challenges that Ghost Cabin imposes on you.
